translation.home.title: Ithuluzi Lokuhlola Ukwehlukana Kwedijithali
translation.home.hero.title: Ithuluzi Lokuhlola Ukwehlukana Kwedijithali
translation.home.hero.subtitle: Ukunika amandla Imifelandawonye Ngokusebenzisa Ushintsho Lwedijithali
translation.home.hero.description: Ithuluzi eliphelele elisuka ku-DGRV ne-BMZ lokusiza imifelandawonye ukukala, ukuhlaziya, nokuvala amagebe okwenziwa kwedijithali ngokuhlola kwamasu kanye nezincomo ezisebenzayo.
translation.home.features.title: Izici Ezibalulekile
translation.home.features.description: Konke okudingayo ukuze uqhube uhambo lwedijithali lwemfelandawonye wakho.
translation.home.features.assessmentDescription: Ukuhlola okuphelele kuyo yonke imibono ebalulekile engu-8 ukukala izinga lakho lamanje lokuvuthwa kwedijithali.
translation.home.features.planningDescription: Chaza isimo sakho sedijithali esihlosiwe bese udala amasu asebenzayo ukuvala amagebe.
translation.home.features.trackingDescription: Gada uhambo lwakho loshintsho lwedijithali ngokuqhathanisa kweminyaka kanye nezinkomba zokusebenza.
translation.home.benefits.title: Kungani Ukhetha Ithuluzi Lethu?
translation.home.benefits.empowermentDescription: Yakhelwe ngokukhethekile imifelandawonye eNingizimu Afrika nangale kwayo.
translation.home.benefits.securityDescription: Ukuphepha kwezinga lebhizinisi ngokugcinwa kwedatha okubethelwe kanye nezipele ezijwayelekile.
translation.home.benefits.accessibilityDescription: Isebenza ku-inthanethi nalapho ungekho ku-inthanethi, ilungiselelwe izindawo ezine-bandwidth ephansi.
translation.home.partners.title: Ithuthukiswe Ngokusekelwa Ngu
translation.home.partners.bmzDescription: Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development
translation.home.cta.title: Ukulungele Ukushintsha Imfelandawonye Yakho?
translation.home.cta.description: Qala uhambo lwakho loshintsho lwedijithali namuhla bese uvula amathuba amasha okukhula nokusebenza kahle.
translation.onboarding.step1.title: Hlola okwamanje kwakho
translation.onboarding.step1.description: Hlola ngokushesha ukuthi imfelandawonye yakho imi kuphi namuhla ohambweni lwayo loshintsho lwedijithali.
translation.onboarding.step2.title: Chaza ikusasa lakho
translation.onboarding.step2.description: Beka umbono wakho wezinga lokwenziwa kwedijithali ofuna ukulifinyelela bese wakha uhlelo lwakho.
translation.onboarding.step3.title: Hlaziya Imiphumela &
translation.onboarding.step3.description: Thola izincomo ezenzelwe wena kanye namasu asebenzayo ukuze uqhube imfelandawonye yakho.
translation.onboarding.completion.title: Ukulungele Ukuqala!
translation.onboarding.completion.subtitle: Uhambo lwakho lokwenziwa kwedijithali luqala manje. Asishintshe imfelandawonye yakho ngemininingwane eqondiswa yidatha kanye nokuhlela kwamasu.
translation.adminDashboard.title: Ideshibhodi Yokulawula
translation.adminDashboard.managementTools.title: Amathulusi Okulawula
translation.adminDashboard.managementTools.descripti: Finyelela izingxenye ezahlukene zesistimu ukuze uzilawule.

translation.adminDashboard.manageDigitalGaps.title: Lawula Amagebe Edijithali
translation.adminDashboard.manageDigitalGaps.descrip: Dala, hlela, uphinde ulawule amagebe edijithali
translation.adminDashboard.manageUsers.title: Lawula Abasebenzisi
translation.adminDashboard.viewReports.title: Buka Imibiko
translation.adminDashboard.recentSubmissions.title: Okuthunyelwe Kwakamuva
translation.adminDashboard.recentSubmissions.descrip: Irekhodi lemisebenzi yakamuva kanye nemicimbi yesistimu.
translation.manageActionPlan.title: Lawula Uhlelo Lokusebenza
translation.manageActionPlan.description: Lapha kulapho ulawula khona uhlelo lokusebenza.
translation.manageDigitalGaps.title: Lawula Amagebe Okwenziwa Kwedijithali
translation.manageDimensions.title: Lawula Imibono
translation.manageGapRecommendations.title: Lawula Izincomo Zamagebe

translation.manageRecommendations.title: Lawula Izincomo
translation.manageRecommendations.description: Engeza, hlela, noma susa izincomo zokuhlola ukwehlukana kwedijithali
translation.viewReports.title: Buka Imibiko
translation.answerDimensionAssessment.submitError: Kwehluleke ukuthumela ukuhlola. Sicela uzame futhi.
translation.answerDimensionAssessment.invalidLevelEr: Kukhethwe izinga elingekho emthethweni. Sicela uzame futhi.
translation.manageCooperations.title: Lawula Ukubambisana
translation.manageCooperations.description: Engeza uphinde ulawule amaphrofayili emifelandawonye kanye nedatha

translation.secondAdminDashboard.recentSubmissionsDe: Irekhodi lemisebenzi yakamuva kanye nemicimbi yesistimu.
translation.assessmentDetailPage.title: Ukuhlola Ukwehlukana Kwedijithali
translation.assessmentDetailPage.welcomeDescription: Hlola imfelandawonye yakho kuyo yonke imibono ebalulekile yedijithali engu-{{count}}. Chofoza ikhadi elingezansi ukuze uqale ukuhlola kwakho.
translation.actionPlanPage.title: Uhlelo lokusebenza lwa {{name}}
translation.actionPlanPage.subtitle: Landelela izenzo zakho kusuka ku “Kufanele Kwenziwe” kuya ku “Kuvunyiwe”.
translation.actionPlansListPage.title: Amasu Okusebenza
translation.actionPlansListPage.subtitle: Buka uphinde ulawule wonke amasu akho okusebenza
translation.manageSubmissions.accessDenied.title: Ukufinyelela Kunqatshiwe
translation.manageSubmissions.accessDenied.message: Awunayo imvume yokubuka okuthunyelwe. Sicela uxhumane nomlawuli wakho.
translation.manageSubmissions.error.title: Iphutha ekulayisheni okuthunyelwe
translation.manageSubmissions.empty.byOrg: Akukho okuthunyelwe okutholakele kwalokhu kuhlola enhlanganweni yakho.
translation.manageSubmissions.empty.byCoop: Akukho okuthunyelwe okutholakele kwalokhu kuhlola ekubambisaneni kwakho.
translation.organizationUsers.title: Lawula Abasebenzisi Benhlangano
translation.manageUsers.title: Khetha inhlangano ukuze ulawule abasebenzisi

translation.thirdAdminDashboard.recentSubmissionsDes: Irekhodi lemisebenzi yakamuva kanye nemicimbi yesistimu.
